text: Hey guys, how do you manage default value for nested field in your field.json ? ( local development only )
<@UGFURDXD4> Thanks Mike, really helped me out here.

Good question <@UV46D6DDY>, I'm thiking about this as well. I was thinking a variable based system would be nice but I don't see how you can implement that in the fields.json file. Anyone have idea about this?

Also, I'm building some modules that will have CTA buttons and was wondering, what's the best practice for them? Using CTA modules that you create in HubSpot or just plain <a></a> tags styled as buttons?
